full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Project Title and Description

* F6140-230298: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for Wharf Reconstruction at Port au Choix, Newfoundland and Labrador
* On behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is soliciting tenders for the reconstruction of a wharf at Port au Choix, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4102227790
* **Publication Date**: August 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Estimated Value**: CAD 1,000,001 - 5,000,000
* **Delivery Period**: 70 weeks after contract award

### Bid Requirements

* Bid Security is a requirement for this tender.
* Suppliers qualified through the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process have been invited to submit a bid.

### Government Instrument (GSIN)

* N/A (None)

### UNSPSC Code

* 72140000: Heavy construction services
* 72141200: Marine construction services

### Procurement Category

* CNST (Construction and Maintenance of Buildings)

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End-User Entity

* Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Contact Information

* Name: Alexandria Dwyer (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information

* This solicitation is for Phase 2 of the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process.
* Suppliers qualified through the ITQ process have been invited to submit a bid. All other responses will be rejected. [emphasis on the statement] Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
